content:
@Chris Moesel , @Mark Kramer
It appears that mixins are not allowed in rulesets. Is this something you have thought about?
I would like to make a feature request for this.

Ruleset: ladedah
Mixins: yadda1, yadda2, yadda3

* .....

Would you prefer a request be done as
a) A ballot item?
b) A github item?
c) a request here on zulip?

--K
I think that is a good idea. Since it is a feature suggestion, not a comment on current content, can you do it here? https://github.com/FHIR/sushi/issues
It is a syntax/grammar change though -- so I think it should be submitted as a ballot comment too. This would allow us to formally support it in FHIR Shorthand 1.0.0.
@Mark Kramer @Chris Moesel Will do. Thx.
